titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the E. E. Cummings Collection
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Archives and Special Collections Library Staff.

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Jason Kovari, 24 Feb 2009.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: The E. E. Cummings Collection includes 2 pencil sketches.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Born 14 October 1894 in Cambridge, Massachusetts, Cummings was amongst the most read poets of the late 20th-century. He died 3 September 1962.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The E. E. Cummings Collection includes 2 pencil sketches, one of a reclining nude and the other of a couple in an erotic pose.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

odd.head: Encoding Information
odd.p: Finding aid encoded by Jason Kovari, 24 Feb 2009.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: E. E. Cummings Collection, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: There is no container list currently available for this collection.
